forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to overcast skies and freezing drizzle after midnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of freezing drizzle later at night. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
